title: Dunkin' Donuts Is Now Selling Bottled Iced Coffee You Can Purchase At The Grocery Store | Josh | DC101
text:
Dunkin' Donuts Is Now Selling Bottled Iced Coffee You Can Purchase At The Grocery Store posted by @JoshOnDC101 - share 
If you're an iced coffee drinker, you're going to LOVE this! Dunkin' Donuts just announced that their delicious iced coffee is going to be bottled and sold at the grocery store. 
For a while now Starbucks has done this with their iced coffee and frapps, so it's exciting that DD is jumping on that bandwagon. 
The ice coffee will be made with Dunkin's signature Arabica coffee blends, milk and real sugar. They will come in the following four flavors: Original Espresso French Vanilla 
These are perfect when you are on the go and can't make it into an actual DD store!
